roleset.name: fail, fail to be able to pay
roleset.note: DEFAULT-V NOTES: frames created by Olga (from default.01-v)
DEFAULT-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns0040. Comparison to 'default-v'. No VN class. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from default.01-n)

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: General Electric Pension took control of the 85-title library last month after Color Systems defaulted on the loan .

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Mr. Lloyd said if Qintex had defaulted it could have been required [*-1] to repay $ 92 million [*U*]in debt under its loan agreements .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: countries in default to the U.S. government

example.name: arg 1
example.text: Pushing the issue on legislation needed to avoid default by the federal government

example.name: both args
example.text: The Assistant is often dubbed "Clippy" or "Clippit", due to its default to a paper clip character, coded as CLIPPIT.ACS.
example.arg: to a paper clip character, coded as CLIPPIT.ACS
